statements: DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 AND role = 'admin';
DELETE FROM UserRoleMapping WHERE user_id = 2 AND role_id = 3;
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'admin')
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe')

DELETE FROM role_permissions_mapping WHERE permission_id = 2 AND role_id = 4;
